transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Ha Mr. Pratik baat kar rahe hain?

Executive: Ji

Customer: Mr. Pratik Vanshtavar baat kar raha hu India Mart se.

Executive: Boliye.

Executive: Ji, company se deal hai aapki profile industry private limited ke naam se.

Executive: Boliye na boliye na sir.

Executive: Ji ji sir kya chal raha hai matlab kuch buylead consume nahi kar rahe hain ya

Customer: Nahi sir aapke area aapke side se koi benefit nahi hai sir mujhe main ab wo paise to bhar diye chod diya sir maine aapka follow up lena aapke end se koi benefit nahi mil raha sir mujhe.

Executive: Aap ek cheez bataiye mujhe aap Pratik ji ek cheez bataiye aap se last time meri baat hui thi sir aap aap se meri baat bhi hui thi meeting bhi hui thi aap.

Customer: Pata nahi sir bahut sare multiple calls aaye hain aapke akele ke call nahi aaye hain ab wo bhi nahi samajhta hai ki multiple calls kahan se aate hain itne sare har call mein agar alag banda baat karega kaise yaad rakhenge sir wo ek hi kam kar thodi hai hamare paas.

Executive: Aapke paas mera number save hoga sir aapki jo welcome call hui thi sir wo maine attend ki thi aapko yaad ho to Sunday time mein meeting bhi kari thi ek.

Customer: Sir aapne mere personal number pe call kiya tha aur waha pe number save hoga is number pe nahi save rahega.

Executive: Achcha achcha wo personal number pe kya entry number se kya tha sir

Customer: Ji abhi aap sir point pe aaiye na kis bare mein baat karna chahte hain aap point pe aaiye.

Executive: Ji point mera kehne ka point ye hai jo main aapke kehna chah raha hu ki jab buylead consume nahi kar rahe ho to kis basis pe matlab kis basis pe nahi kar rahe ho time nahi mil raha.

Customer: Sir aapke end se mili hui lead koi lead kam ki nahi sir main aapko 10 bar profile mein aapne mere se 10 bar laptop pe samne rakh ke update karwa liya aapki profile mein koi bhi lead kam ki nahi hai jab mere ko maine bataya mere ko bulk quantity ke siwa kam nahi karna do do piece ke call kyu aate hain aapke.

Executive: Ye bulk lead mein kam karna hai aapko mujhe pata hai aapko bulk me wo chahiye.

Customer: Nahi sir itka gardi nahi bas kar nahi nahi nahi tumhi teen se char se aapan itka relax gardi ha 500 200.

Executive: Ji Pratik ji jaise aap buylead ka consumption hai jo aapka jo aap buylead consume kariye jis time bhi aapne.

Customer: Sir aapki jo buying leads aa rahi hai wo mere kam ki nahi hai.

Customer: Aur aap log mail pe karte ho ki aapne 10 lead generate kari hai jab latest buylead dekh rahe hain to usme koi lead aayi hui nahi hai koi matlab hi nahi sir uska.

Executive: Pratik ji main bata du agar aapko ek cheez aap mera call receive nahi karte ho main kuch cheezon ke liye call karta hu important batane ke liye.

Customer: Sir koi matlab nahi sir aapka call receive karke karu kya sir main aap mere ko jab bhi bata rahe ho ki

Executive: Aap mujhe bataiye Pratik ji agar aap India Mart sir aap mere personal number pe call kijiye ek bar mere personal number pe call kijiye please.

Executive: Main kar raha hu main kar raha hu 9096411777

Customer: Sir is phone kya hai aapka ye actually is number se aawaz clear nahi aa rahi is phone mein 9096411777

Executive: 90

Executive: 96

Executive: 96

Executive: 411

Executive: 411

Executive: 777

Executive: 777

Executive: Ek second aap sir call pe rahiyega bas ek ek second ke liye main ek bar number update kar deta hu ek bar ye.

Executive: Ye ye nahi sir system mein update mat kijiye aap system mein jis se aapne call kiya hai wahi number rakhiye.

Executive: Achcha ye aapka personal number hai company ka number aapka puch raha hai.

Customer: Ha aapne jo call kiya hai ye company ke number pe kiya hai aap mujhe baat personal number pe kijiye please.

Executive: Achcha sir ek bar number 79

Executive: 9096411777

Executive: Ek minute sir yahi bane rahiyega.

Executive: Aap tak company ke number se baat kar rahe hain kyuki jo registered hai aapka primary mein.

Customer: Ji

Executive: Wo ye wala number hai aur jo aap jis number se aap mujhe baat karne ke liye bol rahe ho wo aapka wo wala number hai apna personal.

Customer: Ji

Executive: Ek second aap sir call pe rahiyega ek minute ke liye main ek minute ke liye.

Executive: Main phone laga raha hu aapko.

Executive: Oswal Oswal Industry Private Limited.

Executive: Industry Private Limited 9096 4117 aur aapne isi number pe baat kiya hai mere se sir abhi kitni der phone pakda ke baithaenge mujhe.

Executive: Sir whatsapp pe number bata diya na call kijiye na aapke free hoke aapke system mein kya update karna hai kar lijiye fir call kijiye na sir main is number pe baat nahi kar pa raha hu is aawaz clear nahi aa rahi hai.

Executive: Kar kar raha hu kar raha hu kar raha hu kar raha hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting any benefit from IndiaMART.

- Leads are not useful.

- Wants calls on personal number.



Resolution:

- Executive asked the customer to stay on call.

- Executive took customer's personal number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call on personal number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, personal number, leads
